description:
Kids crank, so we built one of our famous hydration packs in a size just for them. It comes with a plug-and-play reservoir so the tube can be left in the pack during refills.

  • Made of bombproof polyester fabric with a DWR finish and a PU coating for great water resistance
  • Shoulder straps are shorter and closer together to fit kids’ backs
  • Peforated foam back panel with mesh overlay keeps it breathable
  • Includes a 1.5L TSI reservoir with plug-and-play hose detachment button
  • Hydration sleeve with hook-and-loop hanger, hose port, and elastic loops on shoulder straps for hose routing
  • 1 large compartment and a small zippered pocket with key clip
  • Large stretch mesh exterior pocket is great for stowing a jacket or extra gear
name: MEC Mountain Fountain JR Hydration Pack - Youths
